name: Eden Care
headline: Digital health insurance for employers in Africa
description:
Eden Care is building a digital health insurer for employers in Africa. 

Today, health insurance operation costs in Africa are 2.2x the global average. Eden Care is cutting this by 43% making health insurance cheaper. 

The $11Bn African health insurance market is projected to grow to $72Bn in just  12 years. We are targeting 90 million uninsured African employees.

founders.name: Moses Mukundi, Founder
founders.description: I founded my first startup, an agritech startup,  at 23 that scaled to profitability and was acquired in 2017. I spent 6 years in the insurance and healthcare verticals in Africa before pursuing my MBA at Wharton Business School.

generated_description:
### Eden Care: Redefining Health Insurance in Africa

**Website**: [Eden Care](https://www.edencaremedical.com)  
**Founded**: 2021  
**Location**: Nairobi, Kenya  
**Team Size**: 28 employees  
**Y Combinator**: Part of Batch S23  
**Group Partner**: Tom Blomfield  

#### Mission
Eden Care is on a mission to revolutionize health insurance for employers across Africa with a digital-first approach. They aim to make health insurance not only efficient but significantly more affordable.

#### The Problem
Health insurance costs in Africa are about 2.2 times the global average—this is a staggering statistic when you consider the need for affordable healthcare solutions. Eden Care is determined to cut these costs by 43%, allowing businesses to provide coverage for their employees without breaking the bank.

#### Market Potential
The African health insurance market stands at $11 billion and is projected to skyrocket to $72 billion in the next 12 years. Eden Care is focusing on the untapped pool of 90 million uninsured employees, presenting both a challenge and a massive opportunity.

#### Innovative Solutions
Eden Care's platform offers a completely digital experience designed for efficiency and user-friendliness:
- **Paperless Processes**: 100% digital signups and hassle-free management.
- **Real-time Support**: Available via phone and messaging 24/7.
- **Customized Plans**: No one-size-fits-all; plans are tailored to the specific needs of employers and their employees.
- **ProActive Wellness Programs**: Focus on preventative care, incentivizing users to maintain their health.

#### Customer Base
Eden Care already has a proven track record, serving over 23,000 lives. They are backed by both businesses and educational institutions, including KFW Bank, Carnegie Mellon University, and Radisson Hotels, which highlights their credibility and appeal in the marketplace.

#### Why It Matters
Eden Care isn’t just selling insurance—they’re creating a new narrative around health coverage in Africa. By shifting from traditional insurance paradigms to a digital model that emphasizes wellness, they’re poised to improve the overall health of the workforce while reducing costs for companies. This approach reflects a broader trend toward digital health solutions that recognize the importance of tech in enhancing service delivery.

In summary, Eden Care is more than an insurance provider; it’s a catalyst for change in the African health insurance landscape. They’re tapping into a massive market need with innovative solutions that could set a new standard for how health insurance operates in the region.
